ImpulseSpeedOnNormal.description: Initial speed Sonic is sent off with.

ImpulseSpeedOnBoost.description: Initial speed Sonic is sent off with while boosting.

OutOfControl.description: How long the game locks your control for after coming in contact with this object, in seconds.

SizeType.description: Size of object; 0 for Small, 1 for Medium, 2 for Large. All have an angle of 30°, 15° variant does not exist in Colors unlike Generations and Unleashed.
